step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your wrists a little straighter in future repetitions.
You're doing well raising your hands towards your forehead. Focus on keeping your elbows closer to your head.
Excellent work spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Maintain this position.
You held the position well. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
You're returning to the start position effectively. Try to keep your wrists a bit straighter as you lower your hands.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your wrists straighter and elbows closer to your head for even better results. Keep up the good work!
